card.appdefinition: {"screens":{"main":{"template":{"type":"AdaptiveCard","body":[{"type":"TextBlock","size":"Medium","weight":"Bolder","text":"Daily Work Log Entry","id":"textLabel1"},{"type":"TextBlock","id":"textLabel3","wrap":true,"text":"=Today()"},{"type":"Input.Time","id":"tpStartTime","value":"=Now()","label":"Start Time","placeholder":"Enter start time"},{"type":"Input.Time","id":"tpEndTime","value":"=Now()","label":"End Time"},{"type":"Input.ChoiceSet","id":"drpProject","choices":[{"title":"Choice 1","value":"choice1"},{"title":"Choice 2","value":"choice2"}],"label":"Project"},{"type":"Input.Text","id":"txtNotes","label":"Notes","isMultiline":true}],"actions":[{"type":"Action.Execute","id":"button1","title":"Save","associatedInputs":"auto","verb":"onSelect_Button1","tooltip":"Save time log entry"}],"$schema":"http://adaptivecards.io/schemas/1.4.0/adaptive-card.json","version":"1.4"},"verbs":{"submit":"echo"}}},"sampleData":{"main":{}},"connections":{"bb37482b-5dbb-e47e-b0b9-b5569266b314_ljr_timelog":{"apiName":"shared_commondataserviceforapps","name":"shared-commondataser-011f9f3d-2e00-46d2-babd-b76acad9ec13","apiId":"/providers/Microsoft.PowerApps/apis/shared_commondataserviceforapps","apiDisplayName":"Microsoft Dataverse","tablePluralName":"Time Logs","logicalName":"ljr_timelog","environment":"bb37482b-5dbb-e47e-b0b9-b5569266b314","hasParameters":true},"bb37482b-5dbb-e47e-b0b9-b5569266b314_ljr_project":{"apiName":"shared_commondataserviceforapps","name":"shared-commondataser-011f9f3d-2e00-46d2-babd-b76acad9ec13","apiId":"/providers/Microsoft.PowerApps/apis/shared_commondataserviceforapps","apiDisplayName":"Microsoft Dataverse","tablePluralName":"Projects","logicalName":"ljr_project","environment":"bb37482b-5dbb-e47e-b0b9-b5569266b314","hasParameters":true}},"variables":{},"flows":{},"locale":"en-US"}
card.description: A card to use for logging time through Teams.
card.name: Log Time
